postCreateCommand: curl -sSf https://temporal.download/cli.sh | sh && curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && export PATH="$HOME/.local/bin:$HOME/.temporalio/bin:$PATH" && uv sync && uv pip install pip ipykernel jupyter && uv run python -m ipykernel install --user --name='python3' --display-name='Python 3 (ipykernel)' && echo 'source ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc && $HOME/.temporalio/bin/temporal server start-dev --ui-port 8080
